com.xdays.game.states

Class PlayState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xdays.game.states.State
      • com.xdays.game.states.PlayState

  • public class PlayState
extends State
    PlayState.java - this class is used to render and handle input for the the state where the card game is being played.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Damian Hobeanu, Mark Ebel, Roberto Lovece, Ronil Goldenwalla, Hugh Williams
    See Also:
    State.java
